divs: Sighting Details It was a clear day, cloudless and windless when I noticed an objet very high in the sky that stayed still. Thinking it was a bird perhaps I realized it was too high for a seagull as it appeared white. It then caught the sun and became silver. I thought it could be a metalic plane of some kind but it still remained motionless. When I realized it wasn't a plane, it shot across the blue sky, no vapor trail and no sound, over Cayuga Lake and dissappeared into the blue. I was walking during this time on our road with no traffic.I always look up to spot any birds I may recognize.I did not have a camera so no pics were taken.
Summary: very high, stood still ,turned and caught the sun to look silver colored, then shot north and disappeared. Sky was totally blue and clear
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lansing
This sighting has never been favorited.
